data_table.description: MESA Air Ancillary Study Family Dataset: This dataset provides distance to roadway from primary residence measures for MESA Air Family participants at the time of their baseline exam.

variable.name: exam1_near_roadway
variable.description: INDICATOR FOR RESIDENCE NEAR A ROAD AT EXAM 1
variable.value: HOME MORE THAN 100M FROM A1 ROAD (LIMITED ACCESS HIGHWAY), A2 ROAD (HIGHWAY WITHOUT LIMITED ACCESS), AND MORE THAN 50M FROM A3 ROAD (SECONDARY STATE OR COUNTY HIGHWAY)
HOME WITHIN 100M OF A1 ROAD OR A2 ROAD OR WITHIN 50M OF A3 ROAD

variable.name: exam1_m_to_a1
variable.description: DISTANCE FROM RESIDENCE AT EXAM 1 TO NEAREST A1 ROAD (LIMITED ACCESS HIGHWAY)

variable.name: exam1_min_m_to_a2_a3
variable.description: DISTANCE FROM RESIDENCE AT EXAM 1 TO NEAREST A2 OR A3 ROAD (HIGHWAY WITHOUT LIMITED ACCESS, OR SECONDARY STATE OR COUNTY HIGHWAY)

variable.name: exam2_near_roadway
variable.description: INDICATOR FOR RESIDENCE NEAR A ROAD AT EXAM 2
variable.value: HOME MORE THAN 100M FROM A1 ROAD (LIMITED ACCESS HIGHWAY), A2 ROAD (HIGHWAY WITHOUT LIMITED ACCESS), AND MORE THAN 50M FROM A3 ROAD (SECONDARY STATE OR COUNTY HIGHWAY)
HOME WITHIN 100M OF A1 ROAD OR A2 ROAD OR WITHIN 50M OF A3 ROAD

variable.name: exam2_m_to_a1
variable.description: DISTANCE FROM RESIDENCE AT EXAM 2 TO NEAREST A1 ROAD (LIMITED ACCESS HIGHWAY)

variable.name: exam2_min_m_to_a2_a3
variable.description: DISTANCE FROM RESIDENCE AT EXAM 2 TO NEAREST A2 OR A3 ROAD (HIGHWAY WITHOUT LIMITED ACCESS, OR SECONDARY STATE OR COUNTY HIGHWAY)

variable.name: exam3_near_roadway
variable.description: INDICATOR FOR RESIDENCE NEAR A ROAD AT EXAM 3
variable.value: HOME MORE THAN 100M FROM A1 ROAD (LIMITED ACCESS HIGHWAY), A2 ROAD (HIGHWAY WITHOUT LIMITED ACCESS), AND MORE THAN 50M FROM A3 ROAD (SECONDARY STATE OR COUNTY HIGHWAY)
HOME WITHIN 100M OF A1 ROAD OR A2 ROAD OR WITHIN 50M OF A3 ROAD

variable.name: exam3_m_to_a1
variable.description: DISTANCE FROM RESIDENCE AT EXAM 3 TO NEAREST A1 ROAD (LIMITED ACCESS HIGHWAY)

variable.name: exam3_min_m_to_a2_a3
variable.description: DISTANCE FROM RESIDENCE AT EXAM 3 TO NEAREST A2 OR A3 ROAD (HIGHWAY WITHOUT LIMITED ACCESS, OR SECONDARY STATE OR COUNTY HIGHWAY)

variable.name: exam4_near_roadway
variable.description: INDICATOR FOR RESIDENCE NEAR A ROAD AT EXAM 4
variable.value: HOME MORE THAN 100M FROM A1 ROAD (LIMITED ACCESS HIGHWAY), A2 ROAD (HIGHWAY WITHOUT LIMITED ACCESS), AND MORE THAN 50M FROM A3 ROAD (SECONDARY STATE OR COUNTY HIGHWAY)
HOME WITHIN 100M OF A1 ROAD OR A2 ROAD OR WITHIN 50M OF A3 ROAD

variable.name: exam4_m_to_a1
variable.description: DISTANCE FROM RESIDENCE AT EXAM 4 TO NEAREST A1 ROAD (LIMITED ACCESS HIGHWAY)

variable.name: exam4_min_m_to_a2_a3
variable.description: DISTANCE FROM RESIDENCE AT EXAM 4 TO NEAREST A2 OR A3 ROAD (HIGHWAY WITHOUT LIMITED ACCESS, OR SECONDARY STATE OR COUNTY HIGHWAY)
